issue.title: [Rust] Update checked-in flatbuffer files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9841](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9841). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We can't automatically generate flatbuffer files in Rust due to a bug with required fields. 

The currently checked-in generated files are outdated, and should either be updated manually or by building the flatbuffers project from master in order to update them.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9841?focusedCommentId=17183639) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8039
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8039>
